articles.content:
The domestic fares wars are heating up, with Virgin Australia upping the stakes for the second time in two days slashing the price of Sydney-Melbourne services, with select fares plummeting to $49.

articles.title: 'Travel bubbles' may begin with 14-day quarantine still required - Executive Traveller
articles.description: Australia may remove the roadblocks to travelling overseas before hotel quarantine requirements are similarly relaxed.
articles.content:
Australians planning to scoot overseas as soon as travel bubbles come online are being warned that mandatory 14-day hotel quarantine may still greet them upon returning to Australia.
